titleStmt.title: A Pindarick ode, on New-Year's-Day perform'd by vocal and instrumental musick, before Their Sacred Majesties K. VVilliam and Q. Mary. Set by Dr. John Blow, and written by Thomas D'Urfey.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Abel Roper, at the Mitre near Temple-Bar in Fleet-Street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.

place.placeName: the Mitre near Temple-Bar in Fleet-Street
